effect1.title: Flame Resonance
effect1.description: Increase flame ATK by **15%** and flame resistance by **25%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more flame weapons. This set effect also works with weapons in the off-hand slot. Effect cannot be stacked.

advancement.star1: When using the weapon skill, add **2%** of the enemy's max HP as bonus damage, up to **200%** of ATK.
advancement.star2: Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.
advancement.star3: Using the skill or dodge attack on burning targets will additionally apply *Ionic Burn*, dealing **90%** of ATK as Flame damage every second for **10** seconds.
advancement.star4: Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.
advancement.star5: *Ionic Burn* damage increased to **140%** and dodge attacks from any weapon will refresh the burn's duration.
advancement.star6: The skill *Barrage* has a burning effect that lasts for **15** seconds. Hitting a target with any weapon's dodge attack reduces the cooldown of *Barrage* by **4** seconds, up to once every **1.5** seconds. Damage over time effects trigged from a dodge attack can also trigger the effect.

normal.name: Normal Attack
normal.description: While on the ground, perform 5 basic attacks in a row.
breakdown: Deal damage equal to **54.9%** of ATK + **3**.
Deal damage equal to **79.2%** of ATK + **4**.
Deal damage equal to **99.2%** of ATK + **5**.
Deal damage equal to **149.7%** of ATK + **8**.
Deal damage equal to **144.7%** of ATK + **7**.

normal.name: Charge Attack
normal.description: Tap and hold basic attack to enter the charging attack state, when the charging time increases, the damage increases, up to **100.2%** of ATK + **5** damage to the target; explodes three seconds later (or when the target dies), dealing **25%** of ATK + **1** ranged damage to nearby enemy units, during which every time the target takes damage, the ranged damage is doubled (up to 4 times) and the damage is increased.

normal.name: Jump Attack
normal.description: When in the air or after using a jump, you can launch an air attack. Throwing a bomb forward, dealing damage to enemies in a circular area ahead. Dealing **95.3%** of ATK + **5** damage, and knocks back the target slightly, consuming **250** stamina.

normal.name: Air Attack
normal.description: Press double jump to launch a jump attack in the air. Fires a ray of primal energy downwards and strafes forward, dealing damage to enemies equal to **35.5%** of ATK + **2** damage.

normal.name: Demolition Grenade
normal.description: During a normal attack, hold the basic attack to sweep forward, dealing **107.2%** of ATK + **5** ranged damage to enemies swept through.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to activate a Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. While dodging, you gain hitstun immunity for **0.5** seconds.

dodge.name: Leap Attack
dodge.description: Use a basic attack immediately after dodging to trigger a melee break attack. Inflicts damage to targets in the skill range with **163.9%** of ATK + **8** damage.

skill.name: Barrage
skill.description: Continuously fires at targets within the skill range, causing a total of 700% of ATK + 35 damage, cooldown 60 second.

discharge.name: Multiple Grenade
discharge.description: When a ***weapon is fully charged*** or triggers ***Phantasia***, switching to this weapon from another weapon **removes all debuffs from the wielder** and launches 3 grenades. Hitting a target deals **598.5%** of ATK + **30** damage, with knock-up effect.

recommendedMatrices.name: Ruby
recommendedMatrices.description: Great set for boosting Flame ATK and damage, and providing a shield for added utility. Alternatively, the 2-piece set of Ruby matrices perform well too.

recommendedMatrices.name: Cobalt-B
recommendedMatrices.description: Useful for constantly reapplying the Ionic Burn debuff on enemies.

recommendedMatrices.name: Samir
recommendedMatrices.description: High damage buffing set useful for main DPS weapons.

recommendedMatrices.name: Crow
recommendedMatrices.description: High damage matrix set when you have high crit rate.

recommendedMatrices.name: Sobek
recommendedMatrices.description: A good substitute for SSR damage chips if you don't have them. Very useful against groups of mobs, i.e. in Bygone Phantasm.

matrix.set2: Restore 1 dodge every **4** dodges. Dodge attacks add burn to the target, dealing **13%/17%/21%/25%** attack damage per second for **10** seconds.
matrix.set4: Increases damage by **13%/17%/21%/25%** to targets with abnormal statuses.

awakening.trait1200: When Cobalt-B releases a discharge skill, restore **50** - **120** points of energy charge at random.
awakening.trait4000: When Cobalt-B releases a discharge skill, restore **90** - **180** points of energy charge at random.
